entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
